page.title: 03IPSWICH HOUSING,CONTD.
page.content: Gainsborough Area: This is a mixed council and private area adjacent to Ipswich Airport.The design of buildings include terraced, semi-detached and bungalows, the council houses are post-war and the private houses are more recent. There is evidence that some of the council houses have been purchased by the occupants. The local shops are on the fringe of the area,there is a modern sports centre, a primary school,a library and four churches.Through the area passes busy and wide roads leading to the new Ipswich by-pass and beyond to Felixstowe and Colchester.
